https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q3fwzWn95w1W552I2BNiDRffDdB.jpg A contemporary love story about Peter, a Freudian psychiatrist married to the Finnish Mika, David, a young British gay who lives in Banyoles, addicted to the Grinder, and Coco Lamour, a French actress from Paris. Be Happy!
